attributes.action: A law to make clear markings of all human photoshopped images.
attributes.additional_details: Working with young people who openly talk about these images and the 'thigh gap' etc. It is evident that these have a direct impact on the self image of young and vulnerable, aswell as the general population.
attributes.background: I would like it to be law passed that all photoshopped images of humans are clearly marked with a stamp. This is so people are aware that these body types may not be naturally achievable. I am a father and senior psychiatric nurse who feels this would be a benefit to society.
